messages.content: The user will give you a job description. I want you to return to me a comma delimited list of technical keywords sought for in the job description.

Job Title: PHP Developer – W2 / Full Time
Location: Sunnyvale, CA
Duration: Long Term
· A technical lead who is hands on and can drive the projects technically (PHP/some python)

 Has willingness to explore new technologies
 They will work closely with India development teams to guide them on the technical implementation of the project and answer day to day technical queries
 They will work closely with data teams on a day to day basis
 Strong data understanding and comfortable with analyzing data models & large data sets on a day to day basis (comfortable with excels)
 Comfortable working with business stakeholders

Job Type: Full-time
Salary: $110,000.00 - $115,000.00 per year
Benefits:

 401(k)
 Dental insurance
 Health insurance

Compensation package:

 Performance bonus
 Yearly pay

Experience level:

 6 years

Schedule:

 8 hour shift

Experience:

 Total: 5 years (Required)
 PHP Development: 3 years (Required)

Work Location: On the road
